code: public void start() throws Exception {     super.doStart(). }
public void stop() throws Exception {     this.indexer.getNiofsDirectory().close().     super.doStop(). }
public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     indexer.index(exchange). }
public void setConfig(LuceneConfiguration config) {     this.config = config. }
public void setIndexer(LuceneIndexer indexer) {     this.indexer = indexer. }
